text: The Nikolsburger Rebbe of Monsey Yosef Yechiel Mechel Lebovits, is the rebbe (Hasidic leader) of the Nikolsburg Hasidic community of Monsey, New York. He is a descendant of Shmelke of Nikolsburg, for whom his community is named. == Institutions of Nikolsburg == The community of Nikolsburg in Monsey has a yeshiva for young adults and boys, a kollel and a beis midrash (study hall). == Family == Entertainer Yoel Lebowits is his son. == External links == * Nikolsburg website Category:Hasidic rebbes Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Yosef Yechiel Mechel Lebovits
